prng.seeds

Class SeedStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • prng.seeds.SeedStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileStorage, PreferenceStorage

    public abstract class SeedStorage
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Storage for PRNG seed information.
    Author:
    Simon Greatrix

    • Field Detail

      • LOG

        public static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG
        Logger for seed storage operations

    • Constructor Detail

      • SeedStorage

        public SeedStorage()

    • Method Detail

      • enqueue

        public static void enqueue(Seed seed)
        Enqueue a seed update to be written with the next regular update of the seed file
        Parameters:
        seed - the updated seed

      • getInstance

        public static SeedStorage getInstance()
        Get the seed file where seed information can be stored. Only one thread can work with the storage at a time.
        Returns:
        the seed file instance

      • scramble

        public static byte[] scramble(byte[] data)
        "Encrypt" some data. This preserves the underlying entropy but changes the bit representation of that entropy. By scrambling on every read and write, knowledge of the seed file contents does not reveal the bits actually used in the algorithms.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to scramble
        Returns:
        scrambled data

      • upgradeScrambler

        public static void upgradeScrambler()
        Internal method. This method is invoked automatically at the appropriate time. There is no point in invoking it at any other time.

      • close

        public void close()
        Flush any changes and close the storage. Unlocks the thread lock so that other threads can access the storage.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable

      • closeRaw

        protected void closeRaw()
                 throws StorageException
        Close the actual storage
        Throws:
        StorageException - if the storage cannot be flushed and closed

      • get

        public <T extends Seed> T get(Class<T> type,
                              String name)
        Get a seed of a specific type from persistent storage
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of seed
        Parameters:
        type - the seed's type
        name - the seed's name
        Returns:
        the seed or null

      • get

        public Seed get(String name)
        Get a seed from persistent storage
        Parameters:
        name - the seed's name
        Returns:
        the seed, or null

      • getRaw

        protected abstract byte[] getRaw(String name)
                          throws StorageException
        Get raw seed data from persistent storage
        Parameters:
        name - the seed's name
        Returns:
        the raw data
        Throws:
        StorageException - if the storage cannot be read

      • put

        public void put(Seed seed)
        Save a seed to persistent storage
        Parameters:
        seed - the seed to save

      • putRaw

        protected abstract void putRaw(String name,
                               byte[] data)
                        throws StorageException
        Store the raw form of a seed
        Parameters:
        name - the seed's name
        data - the seed's raw data
        Throws:
        StorageException - if the storage cannot be written to

      • remove

        protected abstract void remove(String name)
        Remove a seed from storage. This is used only when a seed is bad.
        Parameters:
        name - the seed's name
